name: ZR-BOT-MD
description: ZR-BOT-MD is an efficient and versatile WhatsApp bot designed to streamline your messaging experience with innovative features and seamless automation.

BotName.description: Enter your desired bot"s name (Ex:- ZR-BOT-MD)

Footer.description: Enter a watermark for your bot"s messages (Ex:- ? ZR-BOT-MD)

Prefix.description: Enter a specific prefix for your bot, except @, ?, +

Owner_Name.description: Enter a name for bot"s owner (Ex:- LuciZR)

Owner_Number.description: Enter owner"s number of the bot (Ex:- 918293838182)

MongoDB.description: Get your mongoDB url from mongoDB website(Ex:-mongodb+srv://King-MdIsbot:King-MdIsbot@cluster0.hikjrg2.mongodb.net/?retryWrites=true&w=majority)

SESSION_ID.description: Get your session id first, if you already have then paste here

Insta.description: Enter your Instagram user Id (Ex:- LuciZR)

Author.description: Enter a name for sticker"s owner name (Ex:- LuciZR)

PackName.description: Enter a packname for stickers (Ex:- ZR-BOT-MD Stickers)

Web.description: Enter your any social platform link (Ex:- https://github.com/LuciZR)

ThemeEmoji.description: Enter a desired emoji according to your theme (Ex:- ?)

Warns_Limits.description: Enter the limit of warns for users (Ex:- 3)

Welcome_Msg.description: Welcome message for users in groups, $user for user, $prefix for prefix

Left_Msg.description: Goodbye message for users in groups, $user for user, $prefix for prefix
